name: The Legend of Heroes: Zero no Kiseki Kai
summary: To commemorate the 10th anniversaries of Trails series' Crossbell Arc, The Legend of Heroes: Trails from Zero and The Legend of Heroes: Trails to Azure released in 2010 and 2011 have been remastered in high-definition with Full Voice Main Story, High-Speed Skip Mode, 60 FPS Support / High Image & Sound Quality, and Various UI Adjustments.
